categories.title: Desk Accessories
categories.intro: A well-organized workspace reduces friction and helps you focus on what matters.

products.name: Aluminum Monitor Stand with Storage Drawer
products.shortDesc: Elevates monitor, hidden drawer for cables
products.description: Elevates your monitor 4-5 inches to reduce neck strain while providing a hidden drawer for cables, sticky notes, or small accessories. The aluminum construction dissipates heat and supports monitors up to 27 inches.
features: Raises monitor to ergonomic viewing height
Aluminum top acts as passive cooling surface

products.name: Under-Desk Cable Management Tray
products.shortDesc: Mesh tray hides cables and power strips
products.description: A mesh tray that mounts beneath your desk to hold power strips, adapters, and excess cable length. The open mesh design allows airflow to prevent adapter overheating.
features: Keeps cables completely hidden from view
Easy access when you need to add or remove devices

products.name: Extended Desk Mat
products.shortDesc: Large surface pad for keyboard and mouse
products.description: A large surface pad that unifies your keyboard and mouse area while protecting the desk from scratches. Leather options develop patina over time; felt variants offer a softer aesthetic.
features: Covers full keyboard and mouse area
Easy to wipe clean or replace

categories.title: Study Essentials
categories.intro: Tools that support focused learning and information retention.

products.name: Hardcover Dot Grid Notebook
products.shortDesc: A5 notebook with 120gsm paper, dot grid
products.description: A versatile notebook format that works for notes, diagrams, sketches, and bullet journaling. The 5mm dot grid provides alignment guides without visual clutter.
features: Dot grid allows both structured and freeform use
Numbered pages and index for organization

products.name: Adjustable Book Stand
products.description: Holds textbooks, cookbooks, or tablets at an adjustable angle for hands-free reading while you type or cook. Metal page holders keep books open.
features: Page holders prevent book from closing
Folds flat to under 2 inches thick
Supports books up to 4 inches thick

categories.title: Workspace Lighting
categories.intro: Proper lighting reduces eye strain and improves focus during long work sessions.

products.name: LED Desk Lamp
products.description: A desk lamp with adjustable color temperature (typically 2700K-6500K) allows you to switch between warm light for relaxation and cool daylight for focused work.
features: Adjustable color temperature for different tasks
Flexible arm for positioning light precisely

products.name: Monitor Light Bar
products.description: A light bar that clips to the top of your monitor and illuminates your desk without creating screen glare. Asymmetric light distribution shines downward only.
features: Mounts on monitor bezel, takes no desk space

categories.title: Everyday Carry
categories.intro: Portable items that prove useful in daily routines.

products.name: Compact Power Bank
products.description: A portable battery with USB-C Power Delivery for fast charging phones and tablets. 10,000mAh provides roughly 2-3 full phone charges.

products.name: Insulated Water Bottle
products.description: Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12. Stainless steel construction is durable and doesn't retain flavors.
features: Wide mouth for easy cleaning and ice
